_header: Take onions and mince them well
_description: ‘Sauce for a mawlerd rostid’ — three couplets extracted from the Liber Cure Cocorum

CamMagPep1047.First Lines:
Take onyons and mense them welePut sum yn thy mawlerd so have
                    þu sele…
CamMagPep1047.Last Lines:
…Put ale musterd and hony there toBoyle all to gedere tyll hit
                    be enow
CamMagPep1047.Facsimiles:
Hodgett,  G. A. J.,
                        ed.  
             Stere Htt Well: a book of medieval refinements, recipes and remedies,
                from a manuscript in Samuel Pepys’s library.
         Adelaide: Mary Martin Books, [1970?]; Cambridge, 1972.
